channel.title: Comments on: Chappelle’s Grand Theft Auto

item.title: By: Tommy Daranikone
item.dc:creator: Tommy Daranikone
item.description:
Dam dave u funny u know what u should do a chappelle halo for an episode that be tight making fun of it
P.S. I'm Rich Bitch!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
I hate to correct you, Mr. Chappelle, but don't you mean TWO years ago?
P.S. I took the liberty of correcting your URI link. heh, you misspelled Comedy Central.
item.content:encoded:
I hate to correct you, Mr. Chappelle, but don’t you mean TWO years ago?

P.S. I took the liberty of correcting your URI link. heh, you misspelled Comedy Central.

item.title: By: Dave Chappelle
item.dc:creator: Dave Chappelle
item.description: Welcome to 5 years ago! Thanks for watching everyone. We've got some great stuff planned for this season and reading AFKGamer everyday gives me lots of great ideas.
item.content:encoded: Welcome to 5 years ago! Thanks for watching everyone. We’ve got some great stuff planned for this season and reading AFKGamer everyday gives me lots of great ideas.

item.title: By: Kotaku
item.dc:creator: Kotaku
item.description:
<strong>GTA: Chappelle's Reality Edition</strong>
If you ever doubted that Dave Chappelle is worth the $50 million that Comedy Central signed him for, feast your eyes on this. Irreverent to a game we love? Yes. Spot on and hilarious? Also yes. Dear Dave, please...
item.content:encoded:
GTA: Chappelle’s Reality Edition

If you ever doubted that Dave Chappelle is worth the $50 million that Comedy Central signed him for, feast your eyes on this. Irreverent to a game we love? Yes. Spot on and hilarious? Also yes. Dear Dave, please…

item.title: By: tratch
item.dc:creator: tratch
item.description: Dave is a very funny man.
